Models

While Scalatra does not provide a library for models, you are free to use (or not use) any sort of data model you please. Here are some commonly used libraries:

  • Casbah: see a sample integration
  • Lift Record
  • Mongo Record
  • Rogue
  • ScalaQuery: see a sample integration
  • Squeryl: see a sample integration

Twitter

follow @scalatra

Github

See our GitHub project for issue tracking, or contribute code via a pull request.

Google group

Have a question or need help? Help is close at hand, on the scalatra-user Google Group.
